text:
Hello All
<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists/278/contacts/all>
On this API, How can I get lists contact using contact ID.

I would suggest you switch to the newer API v3 instead of v1 which is going to be sunsetted sometime next year I believe.  I am not sure about the list question specifically but I included the v3 version of that too.  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/lists> <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
